reviews.text:
Nice and welcoming pubs, bars and restaurants within walking distance of the train station. I recommend Aurora (wine bar) and the Red Rose (Indian restaurant).
Bring your dog, your family and an ordinance survey map as there are great, safe walks too.
Seel Park, the home of Mossley AFC is easy from the station but up hill... lots of Mossley is.
Visit for one of the one off events, the whit Friday band contest in June or the lantern parade in November. 
Feel free to ask me about any of the things mentioned and I will answer as soon as I possibly can.

Ticket office staff are always helpful. It's clean and tidy but no lifts to train platforms so if you come from Manchester or Liverpool or want to travel to Huddersfield and cannot use stairs you have to use a different station
Ticket office is rarely open outside of peak hours, no ticket machines to buy tickets, means you end up queueing to buy a ticket at Victoria
